alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 2:10PM CDT until October 04 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... East central Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 210 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Eldorado, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Altus, Olustee, Eldorado, Elmer, Altus Air Force Base, Humphreys, and Hess. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
